TIME IS UP

Hundreds of years of exploitation and destruction have brought us to the brink of the abyss. All over the planet people are losing their way of life, their environment, and their lives. We only have a few years left to avert the worst effects of the climate crisis, if weâ€™re not already too late. The sixth mass extinction has begun. What we do in the next few years will determine the future of life on Earth.
